    Authors and Citation

    Authors

    • Bruno Rodrigues. Author, maintainer.

    • Philipp Baumann. Author.

    • David Watkins. Reviewer.
      David reviewed the package (v. 0.9.1) for rOpenSci, see <https://github.com/ropensci/software-review/issues/625>

    • Jacob Wujiciak-Jens. Reviewer.
      Jacob reviewed the package (v. 0.9.1) for rOpenSci, see <https://github.com/ropensci/software-review/issues/625>

    • Richard J. Acton. Contributor.

    • Jordi Rosell. Contributor.

    • Elio Campitelli. Contributor.

    • László Kupcsik. Contributor.

    • Michael Heming. Contributor.
